sentences.sContent: The force of the crash was so strong that the roof of one car flew into the air and landed on an overpass above the tracks.
sentences.sContent_eng: The force of the crash was so strong that the roof of one car flew into the air and landed on an overpass above the tracks.
sentences.sCn: 撞击的力量如此之大，以至于一节车厢的车顶腾空飞起，落在轨道上方的一个天桥上。

sentences.sContent: Otherwise, why would nobody fall in love with a homeless person who lives under an overpass?
sentences.sContent_eng: Otherwise, why would nobody fall in love with a homeless person who lives under an overpass?
sentences.sCn: 她继续说道，“不然的话，为何没人会同一个无家可归、生活在天桥下的人相爱呢？”

remMethod.val: over (在…之上) + pass (通过) → 从上面通过 → 过街天桥
